pullRequest.title: Initial handling of local data
pullRequest.bodyText:
For warsh, the plan is to replace the set of images with an updated set.
To make life easier, the plan is to bundle these with the apk. This
patch allows for copying bundled data for sets that support it instead
of downloading that data from a server.

commit.message:
Initial handling of local data

For warsh, the plan is to replace the set of images with an updated set.
To make life easier, the plan is to bundle these with the apk. This
patch allows for copying bundled data for sets that support it instead
of downloading that data from a server.
